  • Constructor Details

    • player

      public player(int t_p_m, int p_bear, int p_bull, boolean p_stop, int p_id, float p_budget, kapital o_asset)
      Player constructor
      Parameters:
      t_p_m - transactions per minute
      p_bear - bear in bear/bull ratio
      p_bull - bull in bear/bull ratio
      p_stop - stop is true, when the user clicks the stop-button, false if the user click the stop-button again
      p_id - identifier of the player
      p_budget - budget of the player
      o_asset - asset which player may buy

    • update_trans_per_m

      public void update_trans_per_m(int n)
      Update transactions_per_minute by assigning the n
      Parameters:
      n - value which will be assigned to the transaction_per_minute variable

    • update_bear_bull_ratio

      public void update_bear_bull_ratio(int n)
      Updates bear and bull variables
      Parameters:
      n - new value of the bear, 10-n is the new value of the bull

    • update_stop

      public void update_stop(boolean n)
      Update the stop
      Parameters:
      n - if true, then stop is also true
